alert.note: Alert for Lee; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:53PM CDT until July 14 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN PONTOTOC...SOUTHERN UNION AND WEST CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES... At 1253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ecru, or 8 miles south of New Albany, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Pontotoc, Trace State Park, Ecru, New Harmony, Furrs, Sherman, Thaxton, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Poolville, Esperanza, Endville, Cherry Creek, Rough Edge, Nixon, Martintown, Wallerville and Belden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
